item.title: How to get 4K 60 FPS working on an external monitor with Macbooks
item.description: The release of Apple M1 Silicon has laid to rest many questions about whether ARM CPUs can go toe-to-toe with the best of the bunch from Intel and AMD. Can others replicate this?
